title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 19 November 2014 - XWiki
content:

09:58 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
10:09 <vmassol> hmm found a regression at least in 6.2.2  
10:09 <vmassol> https://www.evernote.com/shard/s119/sh/9d1baa7a-3c1e-4fdc-9364-6a1ab24c17d0/646ed0dd4b7a533e1445927fc334fe8a  
10:10 <vmassol> (can be seen on http://playground.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/admin/XWiki/XWikiPreferences?editor=globaladmin&section=XWiki.OfficeImporterAdmin )  
10:10 <vmassol> msmeria: have you noticed this too?  
10:10 <vmassol> (I'm rebuilding master to see if it's there)  
10:10 <tmortagne> vmassol: cannot reproduce on myxwiki.org  
10:11 <tmortagne> http://tuska.myxwiki.org/xwiki/bin/admin/XWiki/XWikiPreferences?editor=globaladmin&section=XWiki.OfficeImporterAdmin  
10:11 <vmassol> ah that's good  
10:11 <tmortagne> seems ok  
10:11 <vmassol> indeed  
10:11 <vmassol> I guess we must have fixed it  
10:11 <tmortagne> should still probably be fixed in 6.2.x  
10:11 <vmassol> if msmeria could check on latest 6.2.x that would be nice :)  
10:12 <vmassol> (I don't have one ATM)  
10:31 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
10:38 <tmortagne> vmassol: cannot reproduce in 6.2.4  
11:05 <vmassol> tmortagne: ok thanks, cool  
11:06 <vmassol> tmortagne: actually it's not there either on xwiki.org  
11:06 <vmassol> just playground  
11:06 <vmassol> maybe someone changed a translation  
11:11 <vmassol> Enygma`: is this spam http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/filme ?  
11:12 <vmassol> should we remove it?  
11:24 <AFKGeek> has joined #xwiki  
11:34 <lucaa> has quit  
11:46 <evalica> vmassol: Edy is mentoring a student today - maybe it was part of the demo - I think he will delete the page soon  
11:51 <vmassol> evalica: not very nice to use xwiki.org for that….  
11:51 <vmassol> he could have use the Repository app locally  
11:51 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
11:51 <evalica> vmassol: they uploaded a xar for that app. he might need to update the screenshots - I don't know

13:10 <gsmeria> tmortagne: Hello. I've just released Forum Application 1.8 on Nexus. Can you please make it available on extensions.xwiki.org? Thank you.  
13:10 <tmortagne> gsmeria: sure  
13:11 <tmortagne> done  
13:12 <gsmeria> Thank you, tmortagne
